title: New Client Wont Load.
body: So basically recently i've been experiencing an issue with LoL on my Mac. Whenever I click the LoL application it endlessly just loads, nothing pops up on my screen and eventually it says above the application that it isn't responding, I'm not sure if its something to do with my computer or LoL if anyone can give me advice or help me fix it please do! Can't wait to play again :D

replies.body: FIXED: I just re-downloaded the LoL game and it is fixed! Sorry if I annoyed you wrench people.
